Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine

package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine

Implementation of a finite-state machine using the rendezvous pattern.

The two main classes in this package are StateMachineEngine and StateMachineController. The former represents the system subject to finite state changes and implements its dynamic behaviour; the latter enables to control the former by sending it messages that trigger transitions. They are related through the observer pattern (see below)

Two interfaces enable to implement other types of engine and controller if needed: StateMachine declares all the methods needed to implement the dynamics of the state machine; StateMachineObserver implements the additional method needed by a GridNode to interact with a StateMachine.

The other classes implements the parts of a StateMachine.

If your state machine is meant to run on a single computer in a possibly multi-thread application, these classes can be used with no additional change. If you plan to use it on more complex architectures (multi-process applications on clusters, grids, etc.), then you will need to extend the possibilities of the AbstractGridNode class to allow for inter-process message passing.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 2 juin 2021
See Also:
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.rendezvous, fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.observer
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    StateMachine
    A finite state-machine.
    StateMachineObserver
    A interface for objects able to understand the various states of a StateMachine.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Event
    An event triggering a state transition.
    Guard
    A guard is a condition checked at the entrance of a State, just before calling the state Procedure, i.e., the procedure will only be called if the guard returns true.
    Procedure
    Actions undertaken when changing state.
    State
    A discrete state characteristic of a state machine.
    StateMachineController
    A class able to understand a state machine and send it relevant messages.
    StateMachineEngine<O extends GridNode>
    Implementation of a universal finite-state machine.
    Transition
    A transition between two states.
